com.st.st25sdk.command

Class Type1Command

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.st25sdk.command.Type1Command
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Type1CommandInterface

    public class Type1Command
extends java.lang.Object
implements Type1CommandInterface
    Defines methods to build Type1 commands

      Lists all possible Frames iso14443A

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] getHr0Hr1()
      Get the HR0 and HR1 bytes describing Type1 Tag memory structure
      byte[] getUidLSB()
      Get the 4 LSB of the UID
      byte[] rall(byte[] uidLSB)
      RALL command (Read All command) for Static Memory Structure Tags as defined by NFCForum TS T1T 1.0 Send back HR0 and HR1 followed by the whole memory content from blocks 0x0 to 0xE
      byte[] read(byte blockAddress, byte[] uidLSB)
      READ command (Read command) for Static Memory Structure Tags as defined by NFCForum TS T1T 1.0
      byte[] read8(byte add8, byte[] uidLSB)
      READ8 command (Read eight bytes command) for Dynamic Memory Structure Tags as defined by NFCForum TS T1T 1.0
      byte[] reqA()
      SENS_REQ command (REQA command) as defined by NFCForum TS DigitalProtocol 1.1 Send the ReqA command (command code 0x26)
      byte[] rid()
      rid command (Read Identifier command) as defined by NFCForum TS DigitalProtocol 1.1 Send back HR0/HR1 (Header metal-mask ROM) and four least significant UID bytes from Block 0
      byte[] rseg(byte adds, byte[] uidLSB)
      RSEG command (Read Segment command) for Dynamic Memory Structure Tags as defined by NFCForum TS T1T 1.0
      byte[] selectType1Tag()
      Send reqA + rid + rall commands to get the 7 bytes UID and select tag
      void writeErase(byte blockAddress, byte data, byte[] uidLSB)
      WRITE-E command (Write Erase command) for Static Memory Structure Tags as defined by NFCForum TS T1T 1.0
      void writeErase8(byte add8, byte[] data, byte[] uidLSB)
      WRITE-E8 command (Write Erase eight bytes command) for Dynamic Memory Structure Tags as defined by NFCForum TS T1T 1.0
      void writeNoErase(byte blockAddress, byte data, byte[] uidLSB)
      WRITE-NE command (Write No Erase command) for Static Memory Structure Tags as defined by NFCForum TS T1T 1.0
      void writeNoErase8(byte add8, byte[] data, byte[] uidLSB)
      WRITE-NE8 command (Write No Erase eight bytes command) for Dynamic Memory Structure Tags as defined by NFCForum TS T1T 1.0
      byte[] wupA()
      ALL_REQ command (WUPA command) as defined by NFCForum TS DigitalProtocol 1.1 Send the WupA command (command code 0x52)

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Returns:
        ATQA0 ATQA1 tag response

      • rid

        public byte[] rid()
           throws STException
        Description copied from interface: Type1CommandInterface
        rid command (Read Identifier command) as defined by NFCForum TS DigitalProtocol 1.1 Send back HR0/HR1 (Header metal-mask ROM) and four least significant UID bytes from Block 0
        Specified by:
        rid in interface Type1CommandInterface
        Returns:
        HR0 HR1 and uidLSB (UID0 UID1 UID2 UID3) tag response

        STException

      • read

        public byte[] read(byte blockAddress,
                   byte[] uidLSB)
            throws STException
        Description copied from interface: Type1CommandInterface
        READ command (Read command) for Static Memory Structure Tags as defined by NFCForum TS T1T 1.0
        Specified by:
        read in interface Type1CommandInterface
        Parameters:
        blockAddress - address of the byte to be read (b8:0 b7654:Static Block(0x0-0xE) b321:byte (0-7))
        uidLSB - tag's UID (bytes 0 1 2 3)
        Returns:
        add and data byte
        Throws:
        STException

      • rseg

        public byte[] rseg(byte adds,
                   byte[] uidLSB)
            throws STException
        Description copied from interface: Type1CommandInterface
        RSEG command (Read Segment command) for Dynamic Memory Structure Tags as defined by NFCForum TS T1T 1.0
        Specified by:
        rseg in interface Type1CommandInterface
        Parameters:
        adds - address of the byte to be read (b8765:Segment b4321:0000)
        uidLSB - tag's UID (bytes 0 1 2 3)
        Returns:
        adds + data bytes (131 response bytes)
        Throws:
        STException

      • read8

        public byte[] read8(byte add8,

             throws STException
        Description copied from interface: Type1CommandInterface

        Specified by:
        read8 in interface Type1CommandInterface
        Parameters:
        add8 - address of the byte to be read (b87654321:Global block)
        uidLSB - tag's UID (bytes 0 1 2 3)
        Returns:
        add8 + 8 data bytes
        Throws:
        STException
